data.title: Allison Koelzer Nelson on LinkedIn: Episode 83
data.meta_description: It was such a pleasure to interview these two all-stars about their experience in the CAPS Network Student Media Agency. Alisa Morse, Deekay Fox, and I have‚Ä¶
data.text:
#MarchMadness is finally here! And the content & media have been fantastic already. Media organizations like NCAA, CBS Sports, and ESPN have leveraged various distribution channels to build awareness & excitement for the big dance. What‚Äôs been most interesting to me is the focus on digital content. I‚Äôve watched my fair share of bracketology videos, but I‚Äôve also learned about lot about the history of the tournament as well. These media companies have done a great job so far getting the basketball enthusiasts hype with a slew of content across the platforms we frequent. Any #contentmarketers out there? Tune in to the March Madness craze over the next few weeks to see how they‚Äôre creating so much content around the moment. üñãÔ∏è If you want me to create a bracket pool for March Madness, say ‚ÄúBracket me please‚Äù in the comments ‚ôªÔ∏è If this post resonated with you, please repost for your network to see. It helps get my writing out there. I write about #mediaandtech, #marketing, and #mindset. #sportsjournalism #media #culture #marchmadness24 #contentmarketing #integratedmarketing #brandedcontent
